originalText.text: Dr. Kalra was amazing! Very thorough. I had a couple of issues with my foot. He took each situation separately and explained very clearly to help me understand. He was very patient with all my questions and made sure I was fully informed on my departure. I’m glad I was able to find someone who explained everything to me and that I feel confident with. Highly recommended!
